title: When a post is well written and makes valid points, but you disagree so you downvote anyway
body:
http://img.pandawhale.com/166237-pirates-of-the-caribbean-reddi-xOJ9.gif

######Fact: I do not downvote posts I disagree with. But most men are not as humble and perfect as I am.

replies.body: *proceeds to downvote post*
https://urtheinspiration.files.wordpress.com/2015/07/anigif_original-26198-1430253629-9.gif
http://i.imgur.com/TNHm1XW.gif?noredirect
https://media.giphy.com/media/bYuBFn3haqnba/giphy.gif
When I upvoted it, someone actually downvoted it, lol. I clicked UPVOTE on 30 upvotes, the buttons now shines that I upvoted it but it's still on 30. Those magical moments.

{{champion:98}} 'd

> I find them unworthy (Of your upvote).

You are like 
https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-il_iq4XdB4k/VzwYb1kxMAI/AAAAAAAAFOc/Mjj0QWJoCmk9_fDIq7jXKk1GYBxnoCuLQCLcB/s1600/That%2527s%2Ba%2Bvalid%2Bpoint%2Bbut%2Bfuck%2Byou%2BI%2527m%2BSpider-Man.jpg

Yeah, you're the epitome of humility and perfection.

Yet we all know what {{champion:112}} tends to say.
"Mid or Feed"?
No, that's {{champion:157}}
Mid AND feed. ftfy

> {{champion:112}} : EMBRACE PROGRESS!

Nailed it.
You are a fish not a man.
https://31.media.tumblr.com/328f313ede131860f311326d3e1d9c1c/tumblr_inline_nkc0scDYls1qzoc3t.gif

*downvoted*

I am awesome at being humble.
http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-3FQG1pCNIw4/Up9eDHkPGRI/AAAAAAAAAeo/7f71H56ob58/s1600/IronMan_historicallyawesome.gif

That...that sentence...MY BRAIN!

It conflicts with itself, fuck's sake Fish! I'm banning Fizz next game, i don't even care.
you must ban {{champion:267}}  too then
Hey Laughing Fish! Do you have a gif for this comment? Entertain me
https://media.giphy.com/media/LEA3o7aT31A8U/giphy.gif

Are we looking at the same set of boards here?

I haven't seen any well written valid points lately.
It depends on whether you consider "hurr durr I deserve challenjour but dynamic queue holds me it bronze so I don't care about rank this season" well written valid points.

I consider up-voting and down-voting to simply be a popularity contest.  Want to see more posts like a certain post?  Up-vote it.  Want to see fewer posts like it?  Down-vote it.

Want to see a well though out, well articulated post even though you disagree with it, because you think it's worthwhile for others to read it?  Up-vote it.

Tired of seeing the same opinion posted about for the thousandth time, regardless of how well written it is?  Down-vote it.
I always consider up-voting or down-voting to be a measurement of whether or not I agree with the post. To the opposite of your stance, I never downvote a post simply because it is not written well.

> ######Fact: I do not downvote posts I disagree with. But most men are not as humble and perfect as I am.

What!? This man claims to be perfect!? _Looks at who posted it._ Ooooooooook. This all makes sense now.
I downvoted folks before it was cool.
It ain't cool now either {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}

Serious question, does anyone actually believe this ever happens?

People won't downvote you if they view your points as valid and well written, they generally just think that even thou you think your points are valid, they aren't.

Yeah, yeah, the joke

-->

My head.

Getting tired of that excuse.
Well, it's pretty depressing to make a civil 2-page-long post, spending close to 1h writing it and checking your info, just to see it oblivioned in the first 15 seconds by 2 downvotes.

> [{quoted}](name=Photos of Ghosts,realm=EUW,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=efBTEEFI,comment-id=00100000,timestamp=2016-05-26T10:35:35.732+0000)
>
> Well, it's pretty depressing to make a civil 2-page-long post, spending close to 1h writing it and checking your info, just to see it oblivioned in the first 15 seconds by 2 downvotes.

Well thing is, people may still view your arguments as shit, they may or may not be right, but that is something they can do.
Thing is, if the post has been made 15 seconds ago, they didn't read it. They fir some reason didn't like the title and didn't even bother commenting. The result is that the post goes to oblivion.

> [{quoted}](name=Photos of Ghosts,realm=EUW,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=efBTEEFI,comment-id=0010000000000000,timestamp=2016-05-26T11:36:01.575+0000)
>
> Thing is, if the post has been made 15 seconds ago, they didn't read it. They fir some reason didn't like the title and didn't even bother commenting. The result is that the post goes to oblivion.

Well it could be that they didn't like the title, people do that, guess some complaints about that can be legitimate.
Sometimes there's just something at the very start of the post which is very off-putting, I for example will auto downvote balance threads which rely heavily on winrates for things where better data is available(so basically "did not get reworked/buffed/nerfed/released 2 days ago") , I may change my opinion and switch the vote later on(unlikely) , but the notion of fine-tuning around winrates equals an auto downvote from me.
A very sad example for me was this: http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance/4xdjxeR4-meddler-the-juggernaut-update-needs-to-be-finished-someday-possibly-soon

> [{quoted}](name=Photos of Ghosts,realm=EUW,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=efBTEEFI,comment-id=001000000000000000000000,timestamp=2016-05-26T12:01:33.524+0000)
>
> A very sad example for me was this: http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance/4xdjxeR4-meddler-the-juggernaut-update-needs-to-be-finished-someday-possibly-soon

It's a long post... but it's not a good one.

Bruisers are supposed to be more oriented towards hp, but they are still supposed to get armor, and tanks are clearly still supposed to use hp.

Sunfire is a tank item, and deadman's is a bruiser item, not because of the stats they give(which are fine) but because tanks value the damage over time more whereas bruisers prefer the mobility deadman's provide, frozen gauntlet is not abused by squishes, it is used by ezreal(in a build which is fair and fits the champion), when ekko builds it he is a tank, not a squishy, and giving tanks damage through armor is not the best idea(though it is a niche for some certain champions), overall I just read the begining but it didn't make any sense, I can understand the downvotes.
Downvoted;)

I gave it an upvote. That's whats wrong with these kids today. Nothing can shatter their world view. Its why we'll be overrun as a nation soon. 

Stop doing the following things: downvoting, listening to EDM, blaming other people, covering your ears and screaming when someone says something you disagree with.
yeah and you forget to say what do to, become a sheep i guess.
What?

> [{quoted}](name=RookPusher,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=efBTEEFI,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-05-25T13:11:35.436+0000)
>
> I gave it an upvote. That's whats wrong with these kids today. Nothing can shatter their world view. Its why we'll be overrun as a nation soon. 
> 
> Stop doing the following things: downvoting, listening to EDM, blaming other people, covering your ears and screaming when someone says something you disagree with.

While I agree with much of what you just said, I'm going to go ahead and say that listening to EDM is really not _that_ taboo, and is in reality not the twelve-year-old shit-fest it is made out to be. It's simply a different genre of music, which falls on different ears in different ways.
Yeah, when I punch you in the face it's clearly YOUR fault that you got hit, no blaming other people allowed or else we'll all be a bunch of panzies.
the "listening to edm" was a joke rite?

I'm sorry...
But you make post about how we shouldn't downvote someone just because we disagree with them.
Then you proceed to list among things you tell us to stop doing "listening to EDM".
Wut?
Listing "listening to EDM" together with "covering your ears and screaming when someone says something you disagree with", implying it's bad in the same manner that someone likes different kind of music than you as it is bad not to listen to counter-arguments. So downvoting someone because one disagrees with them is worse than telling "this music is as bad as ignorance, stop listening to it and your generation will get better".
De gustibus non est disputandum?

That's for the medicine to help you "not get overrun as nation". A man should tidy his own doorstep before judging others.

NOTE: I don't like EDM - before someone would get the idea.

I like how this has so many downvotes.
Schadenfreude.

https://media.giphy.com/media/xTiTnHXbRoaZ1B1Mo8/giphy.gif

"I make well written speeches and make valid points."

*downvotes ensue*
when laughing fish posts unfunny junk again
